ISSUE.TITLE: Facebook authentication - returns page not found if user clicked on cancel after hitting Signin with facebook button
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.1 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. click login link 2. click sign in with Facebook button 3. hit cancel or not now button once Facebook sign page or login page appear 4. redirected to this page https://localhost:44363/signin-facebook?error=access_denied&error_code=200&error_description=Permissions+error&error_reason=user_denied If user Login to Facebook instead of hitting cancel, all went well.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3346 Fixed redirect for failed facebook authentication
